text: "Bad Love" is a 1990 song by Eric Clapton and is the leading single from his 11th studio album Journeyman. It went to number 88 in the United States, number 25 in the United Kingdom, number 10 in Japan and number 83 in the Netherlands and won a Grammy award in 1991. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1990 songs Category:Rock songs Category:Eric Clapton songs
title: Bad Love (Eric Clapton song)
